sentences.english: In the first section are the improvement measures to the legislation of community-based correction.
sentences.chinese: 第一节，我国社区矫正类型的立法完善。

sentences.english: It's great that we're seeing such community spirit sweeping the nation.
sentences.chinese: 这种社区精神遍及全英，真让人高兴。

sentences.english: The community's electronic eye has left the thieves nowhere to hide.
sentences.chinese: 社区电子眼，令小偷小摸无处遁形。

sentences.english: It is a neighborhood beset by all the usual inner-city problems.
sentences.chinese: 这是个为各种内城常见问题所困扰的社区。

sentences.english: Her father, Squire Dickinson, was a lawyer and prominent community member.
sentences.chinese: 狄金森是律师，也是杰出的社区成员。

sentences.english: We are glad to see, newspaper can give community citizen reportorial chance.
sentences.chinese: 我们高兴看到，报纸能给予社区市民报道机会。

sentences.english: What do you mean by upper-medium community?
sentences.chinese: 中上等社区是什么概念啊？

sentences.english: This paper examines a new concept of community-based tourism(CBET) that originated in foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 本文引入了国外基于社区的生态旅游这一新发展理念。

sentences.english: Provides the defined community the regarding system and the landscape system.
sentences.chinese: 提供明晰的社区导视系统和景观体系。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is the countermeasure of community education resource development.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是社区教育资源开发的对策研究。

sentences.english: And sometimes, it seems your community has faded when it is simply taking a breather.
sentences.chinese: 有时社区可能需要缓一缓劲，但您却认为它衰退了。

sentences.english: Once again, the cornerstone is community.
sentences.chinese: 的确，社区是这一切的基石。

sentences.english: Community health workers should be aware of the specialized issues around infant feeding.
sentences.chinese: 社区卫生工作者应了解有关婴儿喂养的专门问题。

sentences.english: And our community banks also have a stake in reform.
sentences.chinese: 我们的社区银行也与此休戚相关。

sentences.english: A | It is certainly a great way to monetize a community.
sentences.chinese: 它当然会成为这样一个社区内一个了不起的创意。

sentences.english: In 2007, the state began to establish disaster-reduction demonstration communities.
sentences.chinese: 2007年，国家开展了减灾示范社区创建活动。

definition: subdistrict office/neighborhood official/an official who works with local residents to report to higher government authorities
home of respect for aged/nursing home
golden years (after the age of about 60)
